column3: â€œSnow Monster is amazing, very potent & now one of my favorites. For an Indica, I was able to stay active but yet was quite cerebral; it managed to take the edge off for several hours. I'm ADHD & a complex PTSD patient whose had several head injuries, it's hard to find a strain that can truly put you at ease like this one did.â€

â€œThis stuff is really good! Snow Monster = great stuff. Very uplifted. Took two hits off a small pipe while watching the sunset. Felt the effects immediately, and rode the high for hours before even coming next to leveling out. Felt a little high-energyâ€”more cerebral and less relaxing than a lot of indicas. Very potent, though!â€

â€œThis is by far one of my favorite Indica strains. It works amazing for the pain I have in my back due to degenerative disc disease. It also works great for my Insomnia, all I have to do is smoke an extra bowl or joint at night and I'm passed out in thirty minutes or so.â€

â€œSmells earthy and sweet with a bit of skunk, and tastes musky and earthy with just a hint of sweetness. It's funky, but tasty all the same.

The high takes a few minutes to arrive, and like most indica-dominant hybrids, starts with a relaxing, happy head high. The body high kicks in about 15 minutes later, and it's strong, but not so strong that you're couch-locked. This is a great strain for the evening, when you wa...â€
â€œWay tasty! Cakes in crystals and it's a beast now I know why it's called Snow  Monsterâ€

â€œThese light green buds are nice and compact and round and dusted in white trichomes. They smell like cat piss and indeed the exhale is a little like dirty socks, but dam it's a hard hitter that's got me feelin no pain. 
Another A+ indica. Thanks TCC in Mesa!â€
